name: ELECTRO-PLASM
description:
ELECTRO-PLASM is a tiny RPG made for the Wowie Jam 4.0. All the code, art, and story was made in three days by myself and my brother! I still have no idea how to make pixel art and the game is very small and unfinished, but we had a great time and learned a lot. (￣ω￣) Thanks for checking it out!

credits
code by TNTeon (check out his gaming / tech YouTube!)
art and story by me
cover art by Ally (thanks fam!!)
music is toi encore by sparky
